sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populating the capability definition field from the solution definition field of HR AI Configuration</description>
        <name>Upgrade HR AI Configuration</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function upgradeHRAiConfiguration(){
    var hrAIConfiguration = new GlideRecord('sn_hr_core_ai_configuration');
    if (!hrAIConfiguration.isValidField('solution_definition'))
		return;
	hrAIConfiguration.addNullQuery('solution_capability_definition');
    hrAIConfiguration.query();
    while (hrAIConfiguration.next()) {
        var solutionDefinitionName = hrAIConfiguration.solution_definition.solution_name;
		var capabilityDefinition = new GlideRecord('ml_capability_definition_base');
		capabilityDefinition.addQuery('solution_name', solutionDefinitionName);
		capabilityDefinition.setLimit(1);
		capabilityDefinition.query();
		if (capabilityDefinition.next()) {
			hrAIConfiguration.setValue('solution_capability_definition', capabilityDefinition.getUniqueValue());
			hrAIConfiguration.update();
		}
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-10-10 09:59:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>878bc2530f540010d0e383fa68767e25</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Upgrade HR AI Configuration</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_878bc2530f540010d0e383fa68767e25</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-10-14 14:21:11</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
